title: Binance sees peak derivatives trading activity during US hours despite CFTC case – Kaiko
description:
Binance’s derivatives trading volume remains strong during U.S. trading hours despite the ongoing legal action by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), according to Paris-based crypto data provider Kaiko. Derivatives are financial instruments whose value is determined by an underlying asset, like Bitcoin. Popular derivatives include futures contracts, forwards, options, and swaps. These instruments allow […]

The post Binance sees peak derivatives trading activity during US hours despite CFTC case – Kaiko appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Suspension of Dollar Withdrawals by Binance US: Implications for BorroeFinance and Ethereum Price
description: Binance.US recently stopped US Dollar withdrawals on the platform after repeated pressure from American regulatory bodies. As a result, users on the platform will have to swap their dollars for Ethereum ($ETH) or other preferred tokens. Thankfully, prices of Ethereum ($ETH) and BorroeFinance ($ROE) stayed stable.
